text:
### (Ct1) ###


Our first pracce is Monday, November 27
th
!

Game Informaon:
December 20 – Games schedules will be released on or before this date. All games are on Saturday.
January 14 – First Game of the Season

Communicaon:
I will be seng up a What’s App Group for sharing updates such as pracce informaon, and communicang with parents.

Addional Informaon:
This year the kids will be using a full-size men’s basketball. The city of Kirkland recommends Baden Rival Basketball 29.5in
(Men’s Basketball)
I would be honored to have an assistant coach to help out. Pracces run much more efficient with two. Please let me know if
you are interested.
Zach and I will be traveling from 12/4 – 12/10. We will not have pracce on 12/4 or 12/6
PLEASE LET ME KNOW IF YOU ARE ON THE SKI BUS. Zach is currently signed up for ski bus. If we have addional kids with this

Thank you!
Joe

th

Hi Team, Happy Holidays. This email has a few reminders and informaon for next year! I won’t see you again unl Tuesday, 1/2/24 at

Winter Break is Monday, December 18
th
– Monday, January 1

This means that we will not have pracces during break since the schools are closed.
Pracces will resume on Tuesday, January 2
nd

Game Schedules –
The updated dates for games are as follows
Saturday, January 6, 2024
NO GAMES - MLK Weekend
Saturday, January 20, 2024
Saturday, January 27, 2024
Saturday, February 3, 2024
Saturday, February 10, 2024
NO GAMES - Mid Winter Break
Saturday, February 24, 2024
Saturday, March 2, 2024
Saturday, March 9, 2024
Game schedules are being completed and will be emailed coaches early next week once they are posted.
Parents will be able to see game schedules once they go live by vising

Our new schedule, starng on Jan 2
nd

Starng on 1/2/24 we will have a new schedule:
a. Tuesday 7-8 pm at Lakeview Elementary School

Thank you!

to last week)

b. Fridays 6-7 pm at Kirkland Middle School

interested in joining. They do not have to go to KMS.

I’m excited to share that the 2023 – 2024 Winter Basketball season is starng soon. My name is Joe Ollis and I will be your team’s
coach and am Zachary’s dad. 6
th
Grade basketball is an excing me as we transion from basic skills to running real plays. I hope the
kids are ready for a solid season of connuing to learn new skills, new plays, and a quick pace of play.

The weekends I’m gone will be 1/25 – 1/28, and then the following week 2/2 – 2/4. I’ll be around the rest of the season.

=== From: Rob Moyer <rob.moyer@gmail.com>

=== To: joeollis@gmail.com
Date Sent: Tuesday, January 2, 2024 2:37:42 PM GMT-08:00
Happy New Year Joe!
Sheesh! I am so sorry I missed this, but I saw it as I was going through your emails just now to see what time practice is
tonight. I coach flag and it's a blast. I just love being around the kids this age.
Speaking of, are you solo here or did you find someone to assist? I think I could help you out if you like. I played in high
school but have never coached, but I can follow your lead and do as I'm told. w
I know having another adult in the room can make all the difference, and I can be a reasonable substitute. I need to
understand the weekend commit along with Skiing but happy to show early tonight.
Just let me know. I am not offended in any way.
best
rm
